page.title: 08FACILITIES-continued-C
page.content: { NEWSAGENT & TOBBACONIST-MR EDWARDS MR EDWARDS ,THE NEWSAGENTS IS ON CASTLE STREET.MR EDWARDS HAS THREE HELPERS WHO TAKE IT IN TURN TO WORK IN THE SHOP.IT IS A SMALL SHOP.IT SELLS ALL DIFFERENT TYPES OF NEWSPAPER AND MAGAZINES ALONG WITH A LARGE VARIETY OF SWEETS. {VERNONS-THE BUTCHER THIS SHOP SELLS ALL KINDS OF MEAT.HE ALSO SELLS FIZZY DRINKS AND ICE-LOLLIES.IT IS NEXT DOOR TO THE NEWSAGENTS. {HAIRDRESSERS THIS IS OWNED BY MRS COUDEY.IT IS AT THE BOTTOM OF BRIDGE STREET AT THE SIDE OF THE BRIDGE.IT IS A SMALL SALON WHICH HAS A CAR-PARK AT THE REAR. {THE CROSS BAKERY THIS IS A SHOP WHICH SELLS BREAD AND CAKES.IT IS OWNED BY MR EDWARDS AND IS ON CASTLE STREET.IT HAS A CAR-PARK.
